column1: }}'''Captain Brackenbrook''' is the leader of [[Archet]]'s garrison.<ref name="Captain">[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Bree-land Introduction
column2: Introduction]], ''Intro: Captain Brackenbrook''</ref> Captain Brackenbrook is mostly found in [[the Mad Badger Inn]], from where he commands the garrison.<ref name="Captain"/> He was killed in the Assault of Archet.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Bree-land Introduction
column3: Introduction]], ''Instance: The Assault on Archet''</ref> After his death his son, [[Jon Brackenbrook
column4: Jon]], succeeds him as captain.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Bree-land Introduction
